message: My Ex of almost 30 yrs would have sent me out alone in the snow...When a drunk threatened to shoot him, he took the shot gun out of the safe, loaded it up and handed it to me to protect HIM...Why? Because he said he was afraid he'd get beat up or end up in jail if he did anything...Some men are like that..

As a Latino and NOT a Trump supporter I think UNIVISION is a bigoted station when it comes to news, they are completely biased and anti anything good. How many times have we seen Jorge Ramos mock religion, specifically the Catholic Church? Hundreds. Hardly ever, are they critical of Venezuela as they are of Donald Trump or any conservative for that matter. Being one of only 2 major Spanish networks in the US does not make you a """"representative"""" it just means that for over 55 million Hispanics we don't have much of a choice in Latin channels. It's Univision or Telemundo. Realistically. To watch news in Spanish I turn to the international Spanish channels now to see unbiased news.
